products.title: Organic Lavender Shampoo
products.description: A soothing and nourishing shampoo infused with organic lavender essential oil. Gently cleanses the hair while promoting relaxation.
products.instructions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

products.title: Sensitive Skin Face Cream
products.description: A gentle face cream formulated for sensitive skin. Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic.
products.instructions: Apply a small amount to clean face and neck. Use morning and night.

products.title: Metal-Free Nail Polish
products.description: A non-toxic nail polish free from harmful metals like lead and nickel. Available in vibrant shades.
products.instructions: Apply two coats for best results.
